name: table-layout
description: Stylable text tables, handling ansi colour. Useful for console output.

scripts.docs: jsdoc2md -t README.hbs index.js -p list --member-index-format list > README.md; echo
scripts.cover: nyc npm test && nyc report --reporter=text-lcov | coveralls
